name:name: # ^ This secondary file joins into Item.tsv by the 'name' column (see Files.tsv: joinInto, joinColumn).
# ^ After joining, the combined type is 'ItemLocalized' (see Files.tsv: joinedTypeName).
# ^ The 'text' type supports escape sequences: \n for newline, \t for tab, \\ for backslash.
ironSword
description:text: A reliable iron sword, favored by new adventurers.\nSharp enough to cut through basic foes.

name:name: oakShield
description:text: A sturdy shield carved from ancient oak.\tProvides solid defense.

name:name: healthPotion
description:text: A crimson vial that restores vitality.\nDrink to recover hit points.

name:name: fireStaff
description:text: A staff imbued with the essence of flame.\nChannels fire magic.

name:name: shadowCloak
description:text: A cloak woven from threads of shadow.\nGrants stealth in darkness.

name:name: legendaryBlade
description:text: The legendary sword of the first hero.\nSaid to glow with the light of dawn.

name:name: earthAmulet
description:text: An amulet that resonates with the power of the earth.

name:name: manaPotion
description:text: A blue potion that restores magical energy.\nTastes faintly of blueberries.
